biotools.summary: Biological Entity Dictionary. Get and explore mapping between identifiers of biological entities. It provides a way to connect to a BED Neo4j database in which the relationships between the identifiers from different sources are recorded.

bioschemas.name: BED
bioschemas.summary: Biological Entity Dictionary. Get and explore mapping between identifiers of biological entities. It provides a way to connect to a BED Neo4j database in which the relationships between the identifiers from different sources are recorded.
